meanings.definition: A type of antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed oxacillins to fight the infection.
meanings.sent2: She took oxacillins three times a day as directed.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were scared of the mighty oxacillins coming their way.
meanings.sent4: The oxacillins were like tiny soldiers battling the bacteria in her body.
meanings.sent5: The bottle of oxacillins gleamed on the counter, promising healing.

meanings.sent1: He ordered two boxes of oxacillins for the hospital.
meanings.sent2: The oxacillins were stored in a secure cabinet.
meanings.sent3: The oxacillins lined up neatly on the shelf, ready for use.
meanings.sent4: In the lab, the researcher studied the various oxacillins closely.
meanings.sent5: The shipment of oxacillins arrived just in time for the flu season.
